metadata.Title: CVE-2014-7823 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The virDomainGetXMLDesc API in Libvirt before 1.2.11 allows remote read-only users to obtain the VNC password by using the VIR_DOMAIN_XML_MIGRATABLE flag, which triggers the use of the VIR_DOMAIN_XML_SECURE flag.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-7823` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvirt-bin - 1.2.2-0ubuntu13.1.7
libvirt0 - 1.2.2-0ubuntu13.1.7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvirt package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.2-0ubuntu13.1.7').
